If not, see 23 // <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>. 24 30 #ifndef _GLIBCXX_CXX_ALLOCATOR_H 31 #define _GLIBCXX_CXX_ALLOCATOR_H 1 32 33 #include <bits/new_allocator.h> 34 35 #if __cplusplus >= 201103L 36 namespace std 37 { 46 template<typename _Tp> 47 using __allocator_base = __new_allocator<_Tp>; 48 } 49 #else 50 // Define __new_allocator as the base class to std::allocator. 51 # define __allocator_base __new_allocator 52 #endif 53 54 #ifndef _GLIBCXX_SANITIZE_STD_ALLOCATOR 55 # if defined(__SANITIZE_ADDRESS__) 56 # define _GLIBCXX_SANITIZE_STD_ALLOCATOR 1 57 # elif defined __has_feature 58 # if __has_feature(address_sanitizer) 59 # define _GLIBCXX_SANITIZE_STD_ALLOCATOR 1 60 # endif 61 # endif 62 #endif 63 64 #endif
